docs.title: DATA 475 - Advanced Concepts in Data Analytics
docs.text:
Part of Data Analytics certificate at SAIT1

This community page will display step-by-step instructions for setting up your machine, along with answers to commonly asked questions.

  1. SAIT: the Southern Alberta Institute of Technology ↩

docs.title: SSL Error when using fetch_openml
docs.text:
Add the following two lines of code at the top of the Python script.

import ssl
ssl._create_default_https_context = ssl._create_unverified_context

See reference from StackOverflow.

docs.title: Python
docs.text: 1. Go to Python 3.9.13 and download the Windows installer (64-bit).

docs.title: Visual Studio Code
docs.text: 1. Go to Visual Studio Code and download VS Code.

docs.title: Microsoft C++ Build Tools
docs.text: 1. Go to Microsoft C++ Build Tools and download Build Tools.

docs.title: Prover9-Mace4
docs.text: 1. Go to Prover9-Mace4 v05 and download installer and patch file.
